text:
Hello!
I think I've encountered a bug while cloning a theme. I selected a folder while cloning where the clone should go. It was MyFolder/MyThemes. But instead, the theme got cloned into root/MyFolder,MyThemes. Did anyone else encounter that?
Also, quick question - I can't seem to find a way to change a theme for already existing Landing Page, is there any way to do that?
<@ULCSUPTGU> We’d love to join the beta as well. We’re actively building new themes. Please DM when you can, thanks!
